reviewText: Not a lot of information in the description, but I was looking for a jewelry-making repousse DVD.  This would be of more interest to folks who fabricate & weld large items (yard art, etc).  They do 2 projects in this dvd, both using copper, and both being larger than 2 feet in diameter.  It was basically 50 minutes of watching a guy pound on metal.  Techniques, tools, and different material were not discussed.
